A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this movie!! Laughed and grinned all the way through. Great character development. Disappointed in all the fanboys who idolised a kind of saint-like Luke and found that his character is actually three dimensional and beautifully flawed. Twists and turns and epic scenes.  Wonderfully crafted addition to the Star Wars journey exploring the force and balance and the never ending cycle.  Bring on episode viii.
